item.description:
Save the date of January 20th for this first Tennis Event for this group. It's been since October { I'm missing the cycling :-( }since our last meetup so I thought it's about time to get another event going!!

I'll plan to match up people of similar abilities - In your RSVP, please let me know whether you consider yourself:

1) What? Me, tennis?? Are you sh...'n me??
2) Beginner
3) Intermediate
4) Advanced

Look forward to seeing y'all on the courts!

Warm Regards,

Rob Fox
item.how_to_find_us: My phone number is 617-254-0123 and will be forwarded to my cell on the date of the event....
item.why: As always with my groups, we're not just out to get some exercise...we're out to have a lot of fun and meet new friends.
item.name: Double's Tennis! Hey, long time no see....
